vqls.dataSelection:
select 
c.product_ "Product",
 [select case when {SP_MARKET}=948 and {20}=0 then '"% Shr Chg" "Nation % Shr Chg" '
                        when {SP_MARKET}=948 then '"% Shr Chg" ' 
                        when {20}=0 then '"% Vol Chg" "Nation % Vol Chg" ' 
              else '"% Vol Chg"' end from dual],
[select case when {20}=0 then ' ' when {SP_MARKET}=948 then '"Nation % Shr Chg",'
else '"Nation % Vol Chg" ,' end from dual]

 1 as SP_USER  
from 
(select market_id, prod,
[select case when {SP_MARKET}=948 then 'round(((cq/decode(sum(cq)over(),0,null,sum(cq)over())) - (pq/decode(sum(pq)over(),0,null,sum(pq)over())))*100,2) "% Shr Chg"'
else 'round(100*(sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,cq,0))-sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,pq,0)))/decode(sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,pq,0)),0,null,sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,pq,0))),2) "% Vol Chg"' end from dual>},
[select case when {SP_MARKET}=948 then 'round(((ntn_cq/decode(sum(ntn_cq)over(),0,null,sum(ntn_cq)over())) - (ntn_pq/decode(sum(ntn_pq)over(),0,null,sum(ntn_pq)over())))*100,2) "Nation % Shr Chg"'
else 'round(100*(sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,ntn_cq,0))-sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,ntn_pq,0)))/decode(sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,ntn_pq,0)),0,null,sum(decode(is_daiichi,1,ntn_pq,0))),2) "Nation % Vol Chg"' end from dual]
from (
select is_daiichi, market_id, decode(is_daiichi,1,product_id,999) prod,
sum(case when d8=0 and d11={11} and d7={7} and d13={13} and d20={20} then t_cq else 0 end) cq,
sum(case when d20=0 then t_cq else 0 end) ntn_cq,
sum(case when d8=0 and d11={11} and d7={7} and d13={13} and d20={20} then t_pq else 0 end) pq,
sum(case when d20=0 then t_pq else 0 end) ntn_pq,
sum(case when d8=0 and d11={11} and d7={7} and d13={13} and d20={20} then t_pfq else 0 end) pfq,
sum(case when d20=0 then t_pfq else 0 end) ntn_pfq
from [select case when {19}=1 then 'info_in_all_pc_q' when {19}=2 then 'info_in_all_cv_q'  else 'info_in_all_hos_q' end from dual] a
where market_id={SP_MARKET} and ({SP_MARKET}<>910 or {SP_IC_CODE}<>'A')
group by is_daiichi, market_id, decode(is_daiichi,1,product_id,999)) {<select case when {SP_MARKET}=948 then ' ' else ' group by market_id, prod' end from dual>} ) a, info_prods b, demo_products_dim c 
where a.prod=b.product_id and
           a.prod=c.product_id(+) and 
           a.market_id=c.market_id and  
           a.market_id=b.market_id 
            and b.d19={19}
order by {<select case when {SP_MARKET}=948 then 'decode(c.product_,''Product A17'',''1'',''Product A1'',''2'',''Product A2'',''3'',c.product_)' else 'c.product_' end from dual>}
